title: A Harp of Fishbones and Other Stories
description: A collection of stories from master story-teller Joan Aiken. Contents A Harp of Fishbones / The Boy With a Wolf's Foot / Mrs. Nutti's Fireplace / Hope / The Lost Five Minutes / The Rose of Puddle Fratrum / The Jar of Cobblestones / A Long Day Without Water / The Prince of Darkness / Two Tales of Burnt Porridge / Humblepuppy / The River Boy / The Gift Pig / The Dark Streets of Kimball's Green.
author: Joan Aiken
